attributes.action: Make Father's have more rights for their child/ren
attributes.additional_details: I am also starting my own campaign Father's For Justice, il be shortly making a website and Facebook page. I want to be interviewed by television news, daytime tele channels. I want OUR campaign to go ahead and fight this for our rights!
attributes.background: I feel that father's don't have much rights they deserve over their children. I want to introduce this to all father's whom pay child maintenance and are on birth certificate who also want to be apart of their child/ren's life.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling for specific rights you would like to see fathers have for their children.
